name: Ogma Inc.
description:
Ogma Applications is a software development company based in Los Angeles, California that develops web-based and mobile applications for clients all around the globe.
The research and development, implementation, quality assurance, and deployment of the projects are conducted in the R&D office which is located in Armenia, Yerevan.
Ogma Inc. and its promised quality assurance for success has proudly been collaborating throughout the years with multiple large businesses, web companies, and individual customers, all attempting to further make their “Concept into a Reality”.
